entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:03 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tobermory 10:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
